english_example_sentence: Last night, I was going to sit in this beautiful park.
russian_example_sentence: Прошлым вечером я собирался сидеть в этом красивом парке.
turkish_example_sentence: Ben dün akşam bu güzel parkta oturacaktım.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Ben dün akşam bu güzel parkta ______.
